a5db03d5-3178-48fe-89c3-d2022bd56655.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how agencies and brands plan media campaigns, buy the media in those plans, and process payments for the ads purchased. Badge earners have also learned how to negotiate and ingest proposed inventory in real-time with sellers and automate digital campaign creation in ad servers.
a5db03d5-3178-48fe-89c3-d2022bd56655.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Digital Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Digital course that establishes the earner's knowledge of the Prisma platform for campaign management.

10e621ed-9584-4a0d-ad5a-d4eebbcb1671.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the basics of ad serving, creative personalization, TV+video advertising, cookieless measurement, verification, and advanced analytics. Additionally, badge earners have demonstrated a clear understanding of and proficiency with creative management tools like Ad Studio, cross-channel storytelling, multi-touch attribution tools, and the use of customized metrics.
10e621ed-9584-4a0d-ad5a-d4eebbcb1671.name: Flashtalking - Campaign Management Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Flashtalking Campaign Management course that establishes the earner's knowledge of the Flashtalking platform for campaign management

b20cd58f-141b-4d7e-885b-464d67187db8.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the basics of ad serving, and creative personalization. Additionally, badge earners have demonstrated a clear understanding of and proficiency with creative management tools like Ad Studio, cross-channel storytelling, working with the HTML5 API, power feeds & feed creative and targeting dynamic creatives.
b20cd58f-141b-4d7e-885b-464d67187db8.name: Flashtalking - Creative Development Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Flashtalking Creative Development course that establishes the earner's knowledge of the Flashtalking platform for creative development.

eae25c1e-2ddb-46c9-9f6e-552fe09ee49a.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how agencies and brands create national media campaigns, forecast ratings, negotiate proposals, and optimize schedules based on campaign objectives and selected criteria.
eae25c1e-2ddb-46c9-9f6e-552fe09ee49a.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) National TV - Prebuy

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Prisma (Buyer Workflow) National TV course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma (Buyer workflow) platform. Go on to submit proof of work on a campaign in the Prisma platform to earn your badge.

0d58e548-a7ba-4806-b579-41a0a4467d9c.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how agencies and brands create local media campaigns, forecast ratings, negotiate proposals, and optimize schedules based on campaign objectives and selected criteria.
0d58e548-a7ba-4806-b579-41a0a4467d9c.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Local TV - Prebuy

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Prisma (Buyer Workflow) Local TV course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma (Buyer workflow) platform. Go on to submit proof of work on a campaign in the Prisma platform to earn your badge.

fc2281ae-4295-4d22-82eb-67ed5c325504.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of authorizations for a campaign budget in Prisma. They will have covered all aspects from creating, approving, and allocating authorizations for campaign budget and managing revisions.
fc2281ae-4295-4d22-82eb-67ed5c325504.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) Authorizations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) Authorizations course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the authorizations process in the platform.

64d9889d-404c-4a8b-a79d-2675803ad4f4.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the basics of ad serving, and creative personalization. Additionally, badge earners have demonstrated a clear understanding of and proficiency with creative management tools like Ad Studio, cross-channel storytelling, working with the HTML5 API, power feeds & feed creative and targeting dynamic creatives.
64d9889d-404c-4a8b-a79d-2675803ad4f4.name: Flashtalking - Creative Development Certification with Honors

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Flashtalking Creative Development course that establishes the earner's knowledge of the Flashtalking platform for creative development. Go on to submit proof of work in Creative Manager in the Flashtalking platform to earn your honors badge.

ad945512-f152-4161-9396-3527db232e4e.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to create and manage budgets in Google Ads via the Prisma integration. They will have covered all aspects from creating and pushing budgets, incrementing budgets and linking back budgets for various scenarios.
ad945512-f152-4161-9396-3527db232e4e.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Google Ads

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Google Ads course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma for Sellers platform.

c2d97de0-dee4-4d25-842f-463fdc5476d8.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the basics of Scope setup, Social publisher activation, customized workflows, and performance enhancement tools. Additionally, badge earners have demonstrated a clear understanding of our reporting suite, 1P/3P/proprietary audience solutions, Smart Group automation, cross-channel creative management, and time-saving opportunities.
c2d97de0-dee4-4d25-842f-463fdc5476d8.name: Scope 1.0 Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Scope 1.0 course that establishes the earner's knowledge of Mediaocean's social ads management platform Scope 1.0.

a65de6b9-8520-4303-9d96-ef0d7ab2fdc9.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how best to use a centralized media management system that unites all parties to efficiently manage global media investments. Badge earners become proficient in visual flowcharting to track flight and vendor information like KPIs, costs, and creative details, and leverage features to support PO management, including regional currency options and support for uploading offline documents to centralize data.
a65de6b9-8520-4303-9d96-ef0d7ab2fdc9.name: Lumina (Global Plans) for Plan Entry

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Lumina Plan Entry course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Lumina platform. Go on to submit proof of work on a campaign in the Lumina platform to earn your honors badge.

0d37cfb7-372a-4575-ab85-c017fa5c364f.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to create and manage campaigns in Facebook via the Prisma integration. They will have covered all aspects from creating campaigns, incrementing budgets, and linking back campaigns for various scenarios.
0d37cfb7-372a-4575-ab85-c017fa5c364f.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Facebook

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Facebook course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma platform.

874c9a2d-40a0-4bb6-818e-c9b4576ec0c4.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to create and manage campaigns in Twitter via the Prisma integration. They will have covered all aspects of creating integrated buys and initiating the link between the platforms.
874c9a2d-40a0-4bb6-818e-c9b4576ec0c4.name: Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Twitter

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Twitter course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma for Sellers platform.

808ed305-fcde-45a4-b22f-4015e913cae7.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how best to use a centralized media management system to manage plan-level Approvals, as well as vendor, media or plan level Authorizations. Badge earners become proficient in the workflow and management of new, amended and cancelled Approvals and Authorizations, including support for PO numbers & uploading plan-specific documents to the authorizations.
808ed305-fcde-45a4-b22f-4015e913cae7.name: Lumina (Global Plans) for Approvers and Authorizers

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Lumina Approver's and Authorizers course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Lumina platform. Go on to submit proof of work on a campaign in the Lumina platform to earn your honors badge.

faa46cb8-ae58-4807-887a-d44170d7025f.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to navigate and submit Local TV proposals and revisions for negotiations with agency buyers via the Prisma for Sellers application.
faa46cb8-ae58-4807-887a-d44170d7025f.name: Prisma for Sellers (Seller Workflow) - Local Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Sellers course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma for Sellers platform.

6049105a-d400-4752-ad9a-6ba7d94af9b9.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of the basics of ad serving, creative personalization, TV+video advertising, cookieless measurement, verification, and advanced analytics. Additionally, badge earners have demonstrated a clear understanding of and proficiency with creative management tools like Ad Studio, cross-channel storytelling, multi-touch attribution tools, and the use of customized metrics.
6049105a-d400-4752-ad9a-6ba7d94af9b9.name: Flashtalking - Campaign Management Certification with Honors

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Flashtalking Campaign Management course that establishes the earner's knowledge of the Flashtalking platform for campaign management. Go on to submit proof of work on a campaign in the Flashtalking platform to earn your honors badge.

e88d6c13-5d40-426a-bc18-0de336ab2fd2.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how to navigate and submit National TV proposals and revisions for negotiations with agency buyers via the Prisma for Sellers application.
e88d6c13-5d40-426a-bc18-0de336ab2fd2.name: Prisma for Sellers (Seller Workflow) - National Foundations

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the relevant regional Prisma (Buyer Workflow) for Sellers - National TV course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Prisma for Sellers platform.

dce28cf7-aa2c-4e4e-b245-8cd60c3caee1.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how finance teams connect with Ignitia from an AR (accounts receivable) perspective, from generating billing to advertisers, to understanding additional AR functionality in real-time. Badge earners have also learned how to work with a variety of different AR reporting options within Ignitia.
dce28cf7-aa2c-4e4e-b245-8cd60c3caee1.name: Ignitia (Media Finance) for Billing

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Ignitia (Media Finance) for Accounts Receivable course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Ignitia platform for AR (accounts receivable) workflow.

9c0e5cd6-e2f9-4ac8-8f67-b057afee1da6.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated an understanding of how finance teams connect with Ignitia from an AP (accounts payable) perspective, from working with supplier invoices for clearance, to understanding additional AP functionality in real-time. Badge earners have also learned how to work with a variety of different AP reporting options within Ignitia.
9c0e5cd6-e2f9-4ac8-8f67-b057afee1da6.name: Ignitia (Media Finance) for Paying

badge_template_activities.title: Pass the Ignitia (Media Finance) for Accounts Payable course that establishes the earners' knowledge of the Ignitia platform for AP workflow.

66097f53-b7d5-494b-89a1-9eb189c448f5.description: Organizations with this badge have demonstrated an understanding of Scope setup, Social publisher activation, customized workflows, and performance enhancement tools. Additionally, the organizations have demonstrated a clear understanding of our reporting suite, 1P/3P/proprietary audience solutions, Smart Group automation, cross-channel creative management, and time-saving opportunities. Finally, these organizations have a number of active clients using Scope 1.0.
66097f53-b7d5-494b-89a1-9eb189c448f5.name: Scope 1.0 Organization-level Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Organizations having this organizational-level badge have a number of certified active Scope users and a number of active clients using Scope to drive their business. Reach out to training@mediaocean.com for more information.
